FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Database Attributes Request Message that was processed. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/Keep Alive, 3: Successful Completion, 4: Failed Completion, 5: Invalid Request)

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Useful to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: ATTRIBUTE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the type of Database Attributes for the first mnemonic to be returned. Value is 1: Limit sets

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MNEMONICS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of mnemonics returned

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the Mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status of the mnemonic: valid mnemonic or valid mnemonic with no data or invalid mnemonic (1: Valid, 2: Valid, No data, 3: Invalid

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.LIMIT-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the type of limits defined for this mnemonic (1: Range Limits, 2: Delta Limits, 3: Both

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.DELTA-LIMIT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Delta limit set for Mnemonic 1

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.MNEMONIC-SWITCH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Dependent mnemonic used to determine which limit set to use in the case of multiple limit sets.

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NUM-OF-RANGE-SETS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of range limit sets defined for this mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.RANGE-SET.m.LIMIT-CONDITION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the limit set m for mnemonic n contains Inclusive or Exclusive limit ranges. (1: Inclusive Limit Set, 2: Exclusive Limit Set)

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.RANGE-SET.m.RH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Limit set Red high limit for Mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.RANGE-SET.m.RL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Limit set Red low limit for Mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.RANGE-SET.m.YH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Limit set Yellow high limit for Mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.RANGE-SET.m.YL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Limit set Yellow low limit for Mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
